**Weekend Classes:**

Yes, Glassybaby offers Introduction to Glassblowing classes on weekends. In fact, they have multiple time slots available on Saturdays and Sundays. You can check their website or call them directly to book a class that fits your schedule.

**Discounts and Promotions:**

Glassybaby occasionally offers promotions, discounts, or special deals for students, first-time attendees, or other groups. Here are a few things to keep in mind:

* **Student Discount:** Glassybaby offers a 10% discount on classes for students with a valid student ID. Just show your ID when you arrive for your class.
* **First-Time Discount:** They sometimes offer a discount for first-time attendees, so it's worth checking their website or social media for current promotions.
* **Birthday Special:** If you're taking a class on your birthday, you'll receive a 10% discount on your class fee.
* **Group Discounts:** If you're booking a class with a group of 4 or more people, you can receive a 10% discount on the total class fee.
* **Gift Certificates:** Glassybaby offers gift certificates, which can be purchased online or in-store. These make a great gift for friends or family members who might be interested in taking a class.

**Special Deals and Packages:**

Glassybaby occasionally partners with local businesses to offer exclusive packages or deals. For example, they might offer a "Glassblowing and Brunch" package, which includes a class and a meal at a nearby restaurant. Keep an eye on their website or social media for these special offers.

**Tips:**

* Always check the Glassybaby website or call them directly for the most up-to-date pricing and schedule information.
* If you're booking a class with a discount, be sure to mention it when you book or arrive for your class.
* Consider purchasing a gift certificate if you're unsure about a specific class date or time.

I hope this helps, and I'm sure you'll have a blast in your Introduction to Glassblowing class!
